task: Develop a basic 'Tetris' game. Modify it by applying the oblique strategy: 'Is the tuning appropriate?'.
name: Tetrix Harmony

branding_data.short_description: Tetrix Harmony is a unique twist on the classic Tetris game, where players must ensure the blocks 'tune' harmoniously as they fall.
branding_data.detailed_description: Tetrix Harmony reinvents the classic Tetris experience by introducing an innovative mechanic where each block has a unique musical note. As blocks fall and lines clear, players must ensure the notes create a harmonious melody. The challenge lies not only in fitting the blocks but also in tuning them appropriately to maintain a pleasant auditory experience. This creative twist requires players to think about both spatial and auditory elements, offering a fresh and engaging puzzle experience.
